text: Kenneth Michael Conaway, known as Mike Conaway (born June 11, 1948), is the U.S. Representative for Texas, serving since 2005. He is a member of the Republican Party. ==Other websites== * Congressman Mike Conaway official U.S. House site * Mike Conaway for Congress * * * * Profile at the Texas Tribune * Mike Conaway - Lessons Learned at Odessa Permian Five Part Series * Profile at SourceWatch Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Texas Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Mike Conaway
